fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Footprint of the Rainbow__
Craftable option providing an immense amount of DEF.
__Favonius Lance__
Provides team-wide energy in return for loss of DEF% on Kachina

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Engulfing Lightning, The Catch__
Due to her best weapon being available for everyone,  alternatives are focused mainly on her Energy Recharge.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> DEF% or Energy Recharge%|<goblet> DEF%|<circlet> CRIT Rate or DEF%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Go, Go Turbo Twirly!
**2)**Elemental Burst: Time to Get Serious!
**3)** Normal Attack: Cragbiter

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: While her talents do not have to be leveled for her support capabilities, she does begin to do non-negligible damage, especially at high constellations.
